text: It’s a great day in @saludaschools! All students have an e-learning day at home, while every district employee has the chance to get the #Covid19 #Vaccine at @SaludaHigh! Many thanks to @_hlivings & @SelfRegional for this life-changing day! #OneSaluda spirit is shining bright! https://t.co/EeVTvLxMCP
